meanings.sent1: The geologist studied the andesites under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: Hiking in the mountains, we came across some andesites along the trail.
meanings.sent3: The andesites in the rock collection looked like tiny dark jewels.
meanings.sent4: The andesites stood out in the landscape like shadows of the past.
meanings.sent5: The andesites sparkled in the sunlight, revealing their hidden beauty.

meanings.sent1: The andesites near the volcano were evidence of its past eruptions.
meanings.sent2: Miners used dynamite to extract andesites from the quarry.
meanings.sent3: The andesites in the garden seemed to have frozen in time.
meanings.sent4: The andesites resembled frozen waves of molten rock.
meanings.sent5: The andesites cooled slowly, creating their unique texture and color.
